Buichers (Amendment) Act, No, 60 of 198! [Certified on 16th September, 1981] . LD—O. 108/78. An Act 20 AMEND THE ButcHens ORDINANCE. BE it enacted by the Parliament of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka as follows :—
1, This Act may be cited as the Butchers (Amendment) Short title. Act, No, 60 of 1981.

2. Section 20 of the Butchers Ordinance (hereinafter Amendment referred to as the “principal enactment”), is hereby 3950 amended, by the substitution, for the words “not exceeding Giger fitty rupees, and in default of payment to imprisonment, 7 either rigorous or simple, for a term not exceeding three ealendar months. ”, of the following :—
“not exceeding two hundred rupees or to imprison ment of either description for a term not exceeding six months, or to both such fine and imprisonment.”,

8. Section 24 of the principal enactment is hereby Amendment amended in subsection (1) of that section, by the substitu- of Section 2¢ tlon, for the words “not exceeding one hundred rupees, principal ‘or to imprisonment of either description for a term not ‘asctment. exceeding six months,”, of the following :—
“not exceeding three hundred rupees or to inprison- mont of either description for a term not exceeding ‘two years, or to both such fine and imprisonment.”.
